column2: Trigger an event for each vassal which then triggers an event from them to us in which we can decide to free them or not.
Trigger an event for each vassal which then triggers an event from them to us in which we can decide to free them or not.
Make each vassal send an event to us that lets use choose to free them or not.
Our overlord is considering granting us our freedom.

The old way of doing things is no more. The model we are forced to follow now is the European one of national states, and our new State cannot easily govern the various ethnic groups in the sub-continent. We will have to expand our knowledge and skill in order to integrate all our potential subjects now...
Our nation is thrown into instability!
